subject: Update on your application to RandomCorp
body_text:
Dear Applicant,

Thank you for taking the time to apply for the Software Engineering Intern position at RandomCorp.

After careful consideration, we have decided to move forward with other candidates whose qualifications more closely match our current needs.

We encourage you to apply again in the future as new opportunities arise. We wish you the best of luck in your job search.

Sincerely,
RandomCorp Talent Acquisition Team
